ygData.subject: RE: Aviak Charms.
ygData.msgSnippet: I dont know about other servers, but on Mith Marr when someone happens across a charm they dont want, they shout out its location for whomever wants it. Never
ygData.messageBody:
I dont know about other servers, but on Mith Marr when someone happens
across
a charm they dont want, they shout out its location for whomever wants it.
Never seen one sold for anywhere near 60 plat, but then again I guess not
everyone is as generous as those nearest the Light Bringer :)


i play on veeshan and one night last week when i was hunting in south karana
some player was /auctioning to loot an aviak charm for 100pp, for over 2
hours... i guess she finally got it, but they are worth it on veeshan, never
really got into making the crafted stuff yet..

Veldra Rae`lynn
lvl 28 magician
Veeshan


Renaldo Rallentandoof the 23rd string
Valharick Healsomany of the 20th level
